name: lnrfrlm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(c2, clnm))

body.pretty:

⊣ ((c0 ∈ LNoeR ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→ c2 =((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c1))
⊣ ((c0 ∈ LNoeR ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c1)∈ LNoeM)

comment: Finite-dimensional free modules over a Noetherian ring are Noetherian. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)
